name: And still the fire burns
description:
Escape a giant wildfire.
A singleplayer / coop platformer.

WebGL version coming soon!

Created within 48h for Ludum Dare 49 (Theme: Unstable)

Source code at https://github.com/Erkberg/LudumDare49

~ Controls ~
You can also view the controls ingame at any time by opening the ingame menu (Esc / Start)

Player one

  • Left Stick / D-Pad / A D (Q) to move
  • LT / A / W (Z) to jump
  • LB / X / Space / Left Shift to run

Player two

  • Right Stick / Arrows to move
  • RT / Up Arrow to jump
  • RB / Right Control / Numpad 0 to run

~ Future plans ~

  • improve visuals, especially trees and ground (the scenery already looks pretty bare before the fire atm…)
  • more interesting level design with a higher use of verticality
  • more cinematic end sequence
  • improve performance
